loewe.button.do_rgb_on_damage.tooltip: Changes whether the lights change when the player gets damage or regenerates Health.

The standard color is set to: 
§eyellow.
loewe.button.standard_color.tooltip.blue:

§bblue§f/§agreen.
loewe.button.show_fps.tooltip: This will show the FPS at the top left corner.
loewe.button.show_cords.tooltip: This will show the cords at the top left corner.
loewe.button.standard_zoom.tooltip: Changes what the standard zoom amount is.

loewe.button.has_cape_glint.tooltip: Changes if the cape has glint.
loewe.button.cape_from_file.tooltip:
Changes whether the cape is loaded from a local file.
(folder: /config/loewe/cape/cape.png)
loewe.button.skip_front_view.tooltip: Skips the front view from the §ef5§f function.
loewe.button.debug.tooltip: This enables the debug mode of this mod.
